strategy: Dark Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Dark Eldar Kabals have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. Partisans and Harlequins receive a +1 modifier when attempting an engage action.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Kabal of the Wraithkind, with Harlequin Allies from the Masque of the Midnight Sorrow.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Dark Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: 0-1 Portable Webway Portal
formations.units: Add a portable Webway Portal to an Archon, Dracon, Succubus or Ancient character in the army. This portable Webway may be used once in a game. After the characters formation completes an action you may place a barrage template marker completely within 15cm of the character and outside any enemy zones of control. This marker counts as a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way. Remove this Webway Portal marker in the end phase of the turn before any rallying.

formations.name: 1 Kabal Coterie
formations.units: One Arcon in a unit of Incubi, three Incubi
extraUnits: Add up to three Reavers: 25 points each
Add up to three Hellions: 25 points each

formations.name: Kabal Syndicate
extraUnits: Add one Dracon to a unit of Warriors: 50 points
Add up to three Reavers: 25 points each
Add up to three Hellions: 25 points each

sections.name: Wraithkind Partisans
sections.description: Up to one for each Wraithkind Kabal

formations.name: Haemonculi Coven
extraUnits: Add one Haemonculus Ancient character to a unit of Haemonculi: 25 points

sections.name: Masque of the Midnight Sorrow Saedaths
sections.description: Up to one Harlequin Saedath for each Wraithkind Kabal

formations.name: 0-1 Serpent's Blood
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, four Skyweavers, two Voidweavers

formations.name: 0-1 Cegorath's Revenge
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, four Harlequin Troupes, two Death Jesters, six Starweavers

formations.name: 0-1 Isha's Tears
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, one Shadowseer, four Death Jesters, two Harlequin Troupes, six Starweavers

formations.name: 0-1 Dance Without End
formations.units: One Harelquin Avatar, one Shadowseer, one Solitaire, two Death Jesters, two Mimes, three Harlequin Troupes, eight Starweavers

sections.name: Wraithkind Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Wraithkind Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Ravager
items.description: One or two Dark Eldar Ravagers

items.name: Wraithkind Transport
items.description: Any combination of transport options may be taken to transport a formation, as long as no vehicle has an empty transport slot. Not all units in a formation require a transport vehicle. Transport options selected may only transport units from the same formation. Up to three Raiders may be added to a formation for free to carry any Incubi, Warrior, Wych, Haemonculi and/or Wrack units, additional Raiders are added for free to transport units from the Dark Eldar Upgrades section, as long as that unit can be transported in a Raider. Any number of Raiders may be replaced by a Tantalus, for 25 points each
